name: 0HourGame2019
description:
Go to https://qst0.com/0Hour2019.html for it for now!

This is a meta interactive story about doing the 0HGJ.

I already made a platformer today for OHGJ and I figured who doesn't like a nice choose your own adventure. 

There are 12 Endings and only one of them is the TRUE ENDING!

Interactive Fiction. Get with it.
